item.title: Pytest cheatsheet
item.description: Pytest is a powerful tool for testing in python. Here are some notes about hands-on experience. Running tests in pytest with/without a specified mark Execute pytest -m "integration" if you want to run only tests that have “@pytest.mark.integration” annotation. Similarly you can run only tests that don’t are not marked. pytest -m "not your_mark" That command will test everything that is not marked as “your_mark”. How to verify exception message using pytest One can use context manager pytest.
